    • Method Detail

      • setClicksToEdit

        public void setClicksToEdit(int value)
        The number of clicks on a grid required to display the editor. The only accepted values are 1 and 2.

        Defaults to: 2

        Parameters:
        value -

      • setTriggerEvent

        public void setTriggerEvent(java.lang.String value)
        The event which triggers editing. Supercedes the clicksToEdit configuration. Maybe one of:

        cellclick, celldblclick, cellfocus, rowfocus.

      • cancelEdit
